data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 9,514 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Adjumani.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Adjumani, Uganda

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Adjumani, Uganda to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Adjumani to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, help the 9,514 believers in Adjumani to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Nubian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Nubian people.
Father, bring yourself glory in Adjumani. Through your servants plant 5 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Adjumani, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Adjumani, Uganda has a population of 28,700.

We estimate Adjumani has 9,514 people who might know Jesus, 14,332 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,854 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Adjumani, Uganda, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

location.name: Adjumani

location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Meneng (7,800), Swahili (5,100), Aringa (631,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Karamojong (849,000)
